title: Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Kim Dae-jung of the Republic of Korea | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




August 18, 2009

 



Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Kim Dae-jung of the Republic of Korea




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                       August 18, 2009 Statement by the President on the Death of Former President Kim Dae-jung of the Republic of Korea  I was saddened at the passing of former President Kim Dae-jung of the Republic of Korea, a courageous champion of democracy and human rights. President Kim risked his life to build and lead a political movement that played a crucial role in establishing a dynamic democratic system in the Republic of Korea. His service to his country, his tireless efforts to promote peace on the Korean Peninsula, and his personal sacrifices on behalf of freedom are inspirational and should never be forgotten. On behalf of the American people, I extend my condolences to his family and to the Korean people.
